original_text: And prepare yourselves by the houses of your fathers, after your courses, according to the writing of David king of Israel, and according to the writing of Solomon his son.
korean_text: 너희는 이스라엘 왕 다윗의 글과 다윗의 아들 솔로몬의 글을 준행하여 너희 족속대로 반열을 따라 스스로 준비하고

sentences.original_text: by the houses of your fathers
according to the writing of David king of Israel
and according to the writing of Solomon his son
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 아들 솔로몬의 기록에 따라
